dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T.-T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: This Kinect captured dataset is currently the largest dataset with RGB+D videos and skeleton data for human action recognition, with 56880 video samples. It contains 60 different action classes including daily actions, mutual, and health-related actions. Samples are captured from 17 setups of cameras, where in different setups, the height and distances of the cameras to the subjects are different.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D Dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Yun
J. Honorio
D. Chattopadhyay
T. L. Berg
D. Samaras
dcterms:description: This Kinect captured dataset is an interaction dataset with two subjects, containing 282 sequences of 8 classes with subject independent 5-fold cross validation.
dcterms:title: SBU Kinect Interaction Dataset

dcterms:creator: J.-F. Hu
W.-S. Zheng
J. Lai
J. Zhang
dcterms:description: This Kinect captured dataset contains 12 actions performed by 40 subjects. It has 480 sequences. Each subject has 20 joints.
dcterms:title: SYSU 3D Human-Object Interaction Set
